fThings to test:

Tadhg
- starting a day prevents appliances from being grabbed
- functionality of hob
Aisha
- functionality of fridge
- functionality of bin
Karl
- customers wait at door for free table
- customers dont wait when table is available
Jane
- customers leave table when given correct food
- customers dont leave table when given wrong food

Each test needs:
	Black box: manual testing without code knowledge (basic shit)
	White box: recird results of manual testing with code knowledge (equiv partitioning, bound value analysis)
	Unit Tests: automated testing conditions
